payment_services_requires: This payment service requires you to be over 18 years or older to enter.
leading_the_future: Leading the future of mobile payments.
opening_moneto: Opening a Moneto wallet is simple, fast, and secure.
your_moneto_wallet_second: Your Moneto wallet can be funded directly from your bank account or credit card. You can also set your wallet to automatically top-up when you hit a low balance.
your_moneto_wallet_third: Your Moneto wallet funds can be used exclusively at participating merchants.
your_moneto_wallet_fourth: Moneto funds can be withdrawn at anytime. Send funds back to your bank account or to a pre-paid card.
by_continuing: By continuing, you agree to our privacy policy and terms of use.
